com.bumptech.glide.loader.bitmap
Class BaseBitmapLoadFactory<T,Y,Z>

java.lang.Object
  com.bumptech.glide.loader.bitmap.BaseBitmapLoadFactory<T,Y,Z>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the model.
Y - The type of the resource that the image ModelLoader provides and the image BitmapDecoder can decode.`
Z - The type of resource that the video ModelLoader provides and the video BitmapDecoder can decode.
All Implemented Interfaces:
BitmapLoadFactory<T>
public class BaseBitmapLoadFactory<T,Y,Z>
extends java.lang.Object
implements BitmapLoadFactory<T>

A base BitmapLoadFactory that composes ModelLoader and BitmapDecoder sub-components to create an BitmapLoadTask capable of loading a model that represents either an image or a video.

Constructor Summary

getLoadTask

public BitmapLoadTask getLoadTask(T model,
                                  int width,
                                  int height)
Description copied from interface: BitmapLoadFactory
Returns a BitmapLoadTask that can fetch and decode a Bitmap for a given model.

Specified by:
getLoadTask in interface BitmapLoadFactory<T>
Parameters:
model - The model representing the specific image.
width - The target width for the decoded Bitmap.
height - The target height for the decoded Bitmap.
